techmeme.title: BeReal CEO Aymeric Roffe says Japan is now the photo sharing app's second-largest market with over 4.5M MAUs, 83% aged 14 to 27; BeReal has 40M users globally (Chihiro Ishikawa/Nikkei Asia)
Thoughts on using LLMs for coding, which can often be difficult and unintuitive, and why "vibe coding" is a fantastic way to explore the capabilities of LLMs (Simon Willison/Simon Willison's Weblog)
Google unveils Gemma 3, the "world's best single-accelerator model", running on a single GPU, in 1B, 4B, 12B, and 27B sizes, and says it outperforms Llama-405B (Abner Li/9to5Google)
A look at community apps like Kutumb mobilizing millions of Indians for politics, spreading disinformation, and inciting hate, beyond civil watchdogs' scrutiny (The Reporters' Collective)
Bengaluru is becoming an AI talent hub as overseas startups compete with Big Tech; Bain & Co predicts India's AI talent gap will reach 1M workers by 2027 (Saritha Rai/Bloomberg)
